value.name: A sister’s quest for answers in Manuel Ellis’ death
value.description: Even his home town, Manuel Ellis' killing by police went largely overlooked. Then his sister, Monet Carter-Mixon, went looking for answers. Her quest ended Thursday with unprecedented charges against three officers,

value.name: Inslee Signs Suite Of Police Accountability Bills
value.description: Washington Gov. Jay Inslee signed a dozen police accountability bills into law this week, including one to create a new oversight agency.

value.name: Inslee signs police bills banning chokeholds, release of disciplinary records
value.description: Jay Inslee signed a dozen bills setting new statewide standards for law enforcement. The governor, joined by community members and families of those impacted, signed the bills at Tacoma's Eastside Community Center almost a year to the day that Minnesota police killed George Floyd.
